item.title: CSV Editor
item.description: A lightweight GUI csv editor written in python. Link to code: https://github.

item.title: Simpleshare
item.description: A local file sharing utility written in Python. Uses multicast UDP to share the list of files, and TCP to transfer the files themselves.
